segments.text: Excuse me , Don ? I hate to bother you , but I need your help on something . Do you have time to brief me on the Martin account today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , that's right . You are supposed to deliver a brief on that account tomorrow . I know there are some things I need to share with you about that . But , gosh , I don't know ... Things are really busy for me today , the only time I can manage to squeeze out might be over lunch break ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hate to make you work through your lunch break with how busy you are ...
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's okay ... I've already had several days in a row working through lunch ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How about this ... We can make it a working lunch this afternoon , and I'll order some Chinese food for delivery . It'll be my treat .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You don't have to do that ...
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I insist . I really appreciate you taking time to work with me in . What is your favorite fast food ? I'll cater to your taste .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Actually I do like Chinese ... Let's make it a date for Chop Suey and the Martin account at about twelve thirty . Does that sound good ?
segments.speaker: S2
